Package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication

Class Jpake2Request

java.lang.Object
com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message
com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake2Request
public class Jpake2Request extends Message
The third authorization message sent to the pump with V2 authorization style which contains the second round of EcJpake. The message structure is identical to Jpake1aRequest and Jpake1bRequest, the second EcJpake round has half the length though so does not need to be split into two sub-messages. When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on Bluetooth connection initialization as part of performing the initial pump pairing process.
Request message for Jpake2Response, opCode 36, size 167
